text: allah tama gættan aturin taman abhimata kala aya ta tama bhagyaya pahala kirima sambandha yen irsyaven yutu va allah pahala kala dæ pratiksepa kara ovun ge atmavan mila ta gat dæ napuru viya. evita ovuhu kopayen kopaya ta bhajanaya vuha. tava da (mevæni) deva pratiksepaka yin ta ninda sahagata danduvam æta
